<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Necromantic Physiology](/Feats.aspx?ID=5720) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=750" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your unusual physiology has developed in a way that makes it difficult for parasites and other infestations to prey upon you. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against diseases. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), you get a critical success instead. If you have a different ability that would improve the save in this way (such as the [battle hardened fighter class feature](/Classes.aspx?ID=1)), if you roll a critical failure on the save you get a failure instead.
name: Necromantic Physiology
